title: Coyote: The Outlander
description: No one knows where or when the mysterious rips will appear, but from them, Outlanders walk the earth, leaving chaos in their wake. Coyote, a charismatic bounty hunter, travels the land with her enigmatic partner, Caesar. Together –with the help of magic and technology—the unlikely duo tracks down these dangerous criminals from different worlds. Along the way, Coyote discovers a secret that threatens to shatter everything she believes about herself, her father, and her sworn enemy, James Westwood. Whether Outlander or inner demons, some things can't be solved with a six shooter.
author: Chantal Noordeloos
